summary: Contoso Wireless offers a variety of TV packages to fit different needs, starting at just $19.99 per month. These packages include access to over 100 channels, on-demand library, Contoso Wireless TV App, DVR service, Cloud DVR, on-screen guide and interactive program guide. 24/7 technical support is available by phone or online chat, and there are various discounts available for customers who downgrade their service or bundle it with other Contoso Wireless services.
